PEARL is a domaln-lndependent system for natural language analYsis that can be customized to handle domain-specific queries to existing data bases.

In any realistic application of natural language analysis, we can expect users to make mistakes, forget to specify necessary parameters, and use words that are not in the system's vocabulary. PEARL accepts requests in unrestricted English: no constraints are placed on the user to stay within a restricted vocabulary or artificial syntax.
